text: I otkuda by ty ni vyshel, obrashchay svoyo litso v storonu Zapretnoy mecheti, i, gde by vy ni byli, doma ili v doroge, obrashchayte vashi litsa, obshchina Mukhammada, v yeyo storonu, chtoby ne vyzvat' u nespravedlivykh lyudey, protivopostavlyayushchikh sebya vam, narekaniy, yesli vy ne budete obrashchat'sya k Kible, ukazannoy vam Allakhom. Togda iudei skazhut: "Kak zhe Mukhammad molitsya, obrashchaya litso v storonu Iyerusalima, v to vremya kak poslannik, upomyanutyy v nashem Pisanii, dolzhen molit'sya, obrashchayas' v storonu Kaaby?" A mnogobozhniki iz arabov skazhut: "Kak zhe Mukhammad ne obrashchayetsya v storonu Kibly Ibrakhima, khotya on govorit, chto priderzhivayetsya yego religii?" Nechestivtsy i otklonivshiyesya ot puti Allakha iz obeikh grupp skazhut, chto ty obrashchayesh'sya v storonu Kaaby, potomu chto ochen' lyubish' svoyu obshchinu i svoyu rodinu. Ne boytes' ikh, - ved' oni ne smogut prichinit' vam zla, - a boytes' i ne oslushaytes' Menya, chtoby YA mog zavershit' milost' vam, - mozhet byt', vy blagodarya etoy Kible budete tvordo stoyat' na pravednom puti
